msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch 'v1_2-branch'.

author: ceki
msg: Added support for resursive variable substitution in OptionConverter.java.
Minor changes so that more of log4j compiles under JDK 1.1. Changes mostly
related to the method in the Vector class.
Minor documentation changes and new comments in source code.

author: oburn
msg: Fixed bug reported by Arvind Chavar, where the XMLLayout has changed from

author: ceki
msg: Removing superflous Makefiles. We only use ANT for building log4j.
